titleStmt.title: A discou[rse] of the ciuile warres [and] late troubles in Fraunce, drawn into Englishe by Geffray Fenton, and deuided into three bookes ... Seene and allowed
titleStmt.author: Serres, Jean de, 1540?-1598.
Fenton, Geoffrey, Sir, 1539?-1608. rans.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Bynneman, for Lucas Harrison and George Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Translated from unidentified sources by Jean de Serres.
With a final colophon leaf; the last two leaves are blank.
Dedication dated: the xxiiij. of May. 1570.
Identified as STC 10793 on UMI microfilm reel 638.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Appears at reel 304 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 638 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy).
